results.marketing_text: The 2 star Fiorita Hotel in Florence is a recently renovated elegant building dating from the early twentieth century and offering a high quality service and a superb location. Ideal for a romantic holiday and relax with the family and friends. Some rooms have a balcony and a view of the cathedral. Furthemore, a bar service and an ADSL or WiFi Internet Point are also available on request. Every morning a plentiful buffet breakfast is served in the terrace where it is possible to have a wonderful sight of Florence. The staff is at your complete disposal to advise you on typical restaurants, to book tickets for shows and exhibitions, tours of the city and its surroundings and a trip to the famous The Mall, a haven of clothing outlets located in Leccio Reggello, just outside Florence. Nearby private garage. Small pets are accepted.

results.marketing_text: Hotel Panorama is centrally located surrounded by some important historical monuments in front of us along Via Cavour lies the beautiful Chiostro dello Scalzo, in Via della Dogana is the rear of the Saint Mark Museum and in Via La Pira is the Giardino dei Semplici. You can start your visit to Florence by just stepping out of the hotel. Only a couple of blocks away are also the Accademy Gallery where the worldwide famous David by Michelangelo is, Lo Spedale degli Innocenti and The Cathedral. The hotel is also well connected with public transportation and can be easily reached by car parking is possible at a closeby public underground.

results.marketing_text: Contemporary style hotel, refubished in 2002. Located just 50 mt from the Fortezza da Basso and 700 mt from the Central railway Station, very close to the Historical Centre. Inside of a Villa of year 1800 you will find 39 rooms endowed of a

The 3 stars Hotel Villa Bonelli is located in Fiesole in the green hills surrounding Florence in a quiet friendly environment.Magnificent Fiesole is one of the more ancient cities of Tuscany.22 rooms,all with private bathroom,television,telephone,A/C,minibar,hairdryer and wall safe.

The 3 star Basilea Hotel in Florence is a welcoming hotel,housed in a converted ex-convent built by Augustinian friars in the 1300s,situated in the historic San Lorenzo district.The 38 comfortable rooms have been recently renovated and offer a warm and pleasant atmosphere.They are all equipped with private bathroom with hairdryer and have individually controlled air conditioning,colour TV,mini bar,direct phone and internet connection.Some rooms boast a small private balcony.Offering a comfortable and welcoming destination for business and leisure travellers alike.The Hotel is easy to reach from the Santa Maria Novella railway station and offers an ideal base for a convenient visit of the city on foot.A friendly and knowledgeable team is always on hand to give terrific advice or provide great suggestions and all kinds of useful information.

descriptions: DOUBLE ROOM LARGE BED WITH BREAKFAST

results.marketing_text: The new three star Hotel I Cedri is located in Scandicci just a stones throw from Florence, a perfect blend of culture and business, ideal for the manager and the businessman who want to combine closeness to the business zone with the artistic beauties of the old city centre, and also for the tourist who can admire both the city and the beautiful hills that surround it. 15 double bedrooms with private bathroom with shower, all modernly furnished and equipped with air conditioning, minibar, safe, satellite TV and telephone. Private car park and a bright breakfast room where a delicious buffet breakfast is served every morning.

results.marketing_text: The elegant 3 star Martelli Hotel in Florence,housed in an ancient Medicean building in the historical centre of the city, has been completely renovated. The 53 rooms have a traditional design, are in a silent position and are all equipped with private bathroom with hairdryer, central air conditioning, colour TV, direct dial telephone, mini bar and safety deposit box. Some rooms feature original frescoed walls. It is believed that Caterina de Medici(1519-1589)slept in room number 47 on her visits to Florence. Both the living room and the breakfast room have maintained their original Florentine style and are equipped with ancient furniture and decorated with wonderful frescos on the walls. A private garage is situated 100 mt from the hotel.

results.marketing_text: Feeling at home. a warm sensation that the Rosary Garden is able to convey to its guests. Located just outside the hubbub of the city center, between the Arno, Michelangelo square and the hills that surround the southern part of Florence, it is the ideal place either for a business or a leisure trip. Completely refurbished, thus creating a charming and cozy atmosphere, elegant and friendly at the same time. Each bedroom is different from the other and equipped with air conditioning, direct telephone, free WiFi, LCD satellite TV, minibar, safe, make up mirror, hairdryer. A charming English style breakfast room, a Tea room, to enjoy daily a complimentary afternoon tea, intimate sitting areas and an Internet point makes the Rosary Garden be your home away from home. The friendly yet professional staff will be able to fulfill your every need. Adjoining restaurant and private parking.
